item.title: {newcoder}{help}
item.dc:creator: @MasterTh1ef MasterTh1ef
item.description:
@MasterTh1ef wrote:

Hey everyone im a new coder i need lots of help first of all, ive downloaded a few sources and clients etc… and yeah im using them I need someone to make a tut send it to me in pm and lemme read the basics of coding…

Something like this like some people say this on their download example: Just open client.java and then change string name w.e to ur welcoming thingy

Well i have 1 and only problem with that…i’ve downloaded the latest version of java and i dont know where to find client.java…i thought it would be in programfiles/java/bin/one of the files/client but its not it i cant find client.java {HELP}

Thats basically my maiin panick is the thing above but i have more… please view

i dont know how to add basic commands for example i need a command maker plox pm that aswell please i got a command maker but i dont know how the hell to use it, what happends i put the coords for the ::tele (place) command example i was gonna make this ::drags (that would’ve tele’d you to blue dragons) that i had the coords and all but then when i clicked make command this java thing pops up and just has a java icon but no name and no file/save as or anything i dont know where to put that in for the command to be permanent etc. {HELP}

Another Problem is Compiling

I need a very basic tutorial man just BASIC not all this complicated stuff just enough so i understand perfect step by step tuts are best for me i’d appreciate it. every time i click compile then it says missing something blah blah link w.e {HELP} I got a shopmaker but i never really used it im gonna try wait. Oh yeah this kinda adds up to my command maker problem because i need coords where the shop would be so i’d make them in lumby etc yeah… {HELP}

Read full topic
